welcome_message_body: Welcome to Porto Feliz, Brazil! Get ready to experience the charm of our city, known for its rich history, beautiful landscapes, and warm hospitality. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring and enjoying everything Porto Feliz has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Sorocaba Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Sorocaba Airport, mainly used for regional and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Viracopos Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal dedicated to domestic flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited coverage in certain areas.
